text:
@JStein_WaPo @AOC @jdawsey1 @costareports please support my petition to hold the government of China accountable in the ICJ for its illegal and unethical cover-up of Coronavirus, which has led it to becoming a global pandemic, causing lives all over the world to be ruined and lost.

https://t.co/3XWoPvCLP2
